definition: palm of the hand/sole of the foot/paw/horseshoe/to slap/to hold in one's hand/to wield
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Use your PDA or computer to set up those long-term ticklers .
sentences.chinese: 用你的掌上电脑或台式电脑创立那些长期的备忘录。

sentences.english: Palmtops are the smallest because they fit in the palm of your hand.
sentences.chinese: 掌上电脑是最小的，因为他们适合你的手掌里。

sentences.english: Stores the custom word list on the 7100 series handhelds.
sentences.chinese: 储存自订字清单上7100系列掌上电脑。

sentences.english: There will be a version for WiFi-enabled Pocket PCs and Smartphones.
sentences.chinese: 将有一个无线版本功能的掌上电脑和智能手机。

sentences.english: Stop using the tiny keyboard on your PDA and see if they grow back to normal.
sentences.chinese: 停止使用你的掌上电脑，看看它们能不能恢复原状。

sentences.english: Better not to use pocket dictionaries and palmtop electronic dictionaries without examples.
sentences.chinese: 最好不用袖珍字典或者掌上电脑。

definition: tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]

pinyin: bi3 ji4 ben3 ji4 suan4 ji1
